content.title: RHSA-2020:3598: kernel security and bug fix update (Important)
content.description:
The kernel packages contain the Linux kernel, the core of any Linux operating system.

Security Fix(es):

* kernel: kernel: DAX hugepages not considered during mremap (CVE-2020-10757)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

Bug Fix(es):

* [7.7 - Backport request] kernel: scsi: ses: don't ask for diagnostic pages repeatedly during probe (BZ#1861331)

* kernel: Race condition in hashtables (BZ#1868687)
